meanings.sent1: She carefully reengraves her initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to reengrave the design on the metal plate.
meanings.sent3: After a mistake, she had to reengrave the message on the trophy.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day are reengraved in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The love for her family is reengraved in her heart forever.

meanings.definition: To carve or cut into a surface again.
meanings.sent1: He used a sharp tool to reengrave his name on the wooden sign.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor had to reengrave the intricate details on the statue.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to reengrave its initials on the tree bark.
meanings.sent4: The words of wisdom were reengraved on the ancient stone tablet.
meanings.sent5: The symbol was reengraved on the ancient artifact, revealing its true meaning.
